definitions.definition: The process of a liquid converting to the gaseous state.
The process in which all or a portion of liquid (in a container) is turned into vapour , in order to increase the concentration of solid matter in the mixture.

main_definition: The process of a liquid converting to the gaseous state.
secondary_definitions: The process in which all or a portion of liquid (in a container) is turned into vapour , in order to increase the concentration of solid matter in the mixture.
( archaic ) That which is evaporated; vapor .
